> 
> ITT we summon Harvester!

Five! Wow!
Every time I go to the next page a new one appears.

> 
> ??????

Different page count!
we should try for 3000 posts, seems easy...
So close to 300! There's no guarantee it will release on 300, but it might!
It is dead [http://kerbalx.com/countdown](http://kerbalx.com/countdown)
Almost! Everyone press "z" rapidly now!
We broke kerbalx!
We are going to break the Hype record! It's rapidly approaching!
Every time I flip to a new page there's another one!
I keep hitting "last" to jump to the last page, but there's always another page there. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> "The most members online in one day was 4,156, Today."

O\_O sounds about right
Well, happy hyping. Off to work.
the website will be returning with the offer for a limited edition hardcopy version of KSP

> 
> My gauges are reading 294

Just trying to post it on the 300th page, lol
Finally! 300!

> 
> This is going so fast that when I refresh, it kicks me back 2 pages.

The same causality violation is being observed here
Almost there!

> 
> WE NEED WHEELS TO MOVE!!!! WHEELS ARE OF GREATEST IMPORTANCE FOR HYPE OPERATIONS
> nocaps

Wheels where we're going we don't need wheels. ONLY HYYYYYYYPE

We made it!
I can feel it, we are ascending to a new plane of HYPE!
